title: I Want to Know About You
detail_text: <:th_ch0008/>Wow!! That was awesome! Lanzhu-san, you’re the best!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Of course! Feel free to stare at Lanzhu. She gave her all into that performance.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Yeah, your feelings totally reached me, and I couldn’t take my eyes off of you, Lanzhu-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Keep the compliments coming! Oh, have something for you, Hanayo. Here you go.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>What is this...... Ah, i-is this......!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>It’s your favorite, rice balls! Lanzhu heard this from everyone else, it’s your favorite food in the world!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Huh? So your performance was dedicated to me? And these rice balls......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Yup! You enjoyed it, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Fufu, I’m thrilled. But I don’t know your favorite food or what you like to do. So, Lanzhu-san, could you tell me more about yourself?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Kyah! Of course, of course! Lanzhu will tell you all about herself!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
